Sandy_Springs.Buckhead Grand: The Buckhead Grand building is a 137.5-meter (451.115-feet) tall skyscraper in Buckhead, Atlanta, Georgia. The 36-story residential building, designed by Smallwood, Reynolds, Stewart, Stewart & Associates, Inc., was constructed starting in 2003 and finishing in mid-2004. This highrise was built with 286 residential units ranging in size from 900 square feet (84 m2) to 3,000 square feet (280 m2).
